description:
A solid fibreglass shaft, with big fiberglass dihedral blades offer power for blasting out of turbulence. The Rogue is the most powerful whitewater paddle in Accent's lineup.

  • Blades are compression molded tri-axial fibreglass
  • Straight single-piece fibreglass shaft offers a precise and powerful feel
  • Large asymmetric blades provides maximum power
name: Accent Premier Rogue Kayak Paddle
